aboutUs.en: Shandong Baijian International Trade Co., Ltd was established in October 2008. We mainly deal with all vehicle parts for Sinotruk and Weichai vehicles, and have now developed into a professional sales company for Sinotruk and Weichai engine parts. The company's sales network currently covers the whole country. We adhere to the principles of honesty, genuine products at fair prices, quality assurance, customer first, and reputation first to serve the auto parts industry, strictly controlling product quality and providing excellent pre-sales, sales, and after-sales services. Our products cover natural gas engines, mining vehicles, special vehicles, modified vehicles, etc. In terms of enterprise management, the company adheres to the corporate goal of 'gathering first-class talents to provide first-class services; implementing first-class management to create a first-class enterprise'.

description.en: Premium quality front brake pads for Sinotruk HOWO A7. OEM equivalent quality with excellent stopping power and low dust formula. Suitable for heavy-duty applications.
Genuine Weichai oil filter for WP10 engines. High-efficiency filtration media ensures maximum engine protection and extended service life.
Complete natural gas engine parts set for Sinotruk LNG vehicles. Includes all essential components for engine maintenance and repair. Genuine OEM parts with warranty.

deliverables: Fully functional Nuxt 4 application with bilingual support (EN/ZH)
All pages implemented with language switching
SEO optimized with meta tags and structured data (bilingual)
Proper error handling and loading states (bilingual messages)
Company logo, WeChat QR code, placeholder images
designPrinciples: Bilingual support (English/Chinese) throughout the entire site
Keep it simple - Clean, professional, not overdesigned
Fast loading - Lazy load images, optimize bundle
SEO-focused - Every page optimized for search engines in both languages
Professional - Business-oriented design matching company branding
Cultural sensitivity - Appropriate design for both Western and Chinese markets
priorityOrder: 1. Language switching functionality and i18n setup
2. Product detail page (/product/[slug].vue) with bilingual content - MOST IMPORTANT
3. Product card component with bilingual support
5. Header and Footer with language switcher
importantNotes: ALL files must use .js extension, NOT .ts
Search/filtering endpoint uses POST method, not GET
Company information from screenshots must be integrated exactly
Both English and Chinese content must be available on every page
Language preference should persist across sessions
Contact form should be functional with bilingual labels
WeChat QR code should be prominently displayed
Company logo (çº¢è‰² BAIJIAN logo) should be used consistently
Focus on Sinotruk and Weichai as primary brands
